summary: BIG YELLOW WRENCH APPEARED ON IP CLUSTER WHILE DRIVING, SPEEDOMETER DROPPED TO "0", TACHOMETER NOW WON'T DROP TO "0" READS HIGH ALL THE TIME.  TOOK IT TO THE FORD DEALER, WAS CHARGED FOR A "LEAD FRAME" REPLACEMENT; TACHOMETER STILL DOESN'T WORK; NOW I FIND OUT THERE IS/WAS A RECALL ON THE LEAD FRAME.
